name: Green Sauce With Avocado
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: avocado, green chili, tomatillo, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient:
2 fresh serrano or jalapeño chilies,
or to taste, stemmed,
seeded and coarsely chopped

6 to 8 tomatillos (about 1/2 pound),
husks removed, and quartered

recipeInstructions.text:
In a food processor or with mortar and
pestle, process or pound the garlic
and salt to a paste. Add onion, chilies and
tomatillos; pulse in processor, or pound
to make a slightly chunky paste.

Scoop out the avocado flesh. For a
smooth, machine-finished purée, add it
and the cilantro to the processor, and
process very fine. To do it by hand, finely
chop the avocado, and mash it into
the onion-tomatillo mixture; stir in cilantro
leaves. (For a medium texture, pour
the machine-processed onion-tomatillo
mixture into a bowl, and mix in the
chopped avocado and cilantro.)

Serve immediately as a dip or a sauce
with chips or vegetables.
